content.title: Dr. Akmon Akashic
content.body:
Dr. Akmon Akashic is the inventor of the Akashic Tome and the Queen's most trusted scientist.
He's always been a pioneer in his field of general studies, but when things get too specific, he does pass it on to a member of his staff.
Being the Queen's most trusted researcher and adviser, she denotes most tasks to him; despite the fact that there are many servants who could easily take over for menial tasks.
Not much is known about his past, but it is said that he was once a wanderer with no direction or place to call home - until Queen Aurora hired him as a science adviser.
He's proven himself since that day, adamant to show that Her Majesty made a good choice when taking him in.
He's generally quiet, reserved, and straight-forward; but very intelligent and adaptable.
